text: Jesse Everett Hughes (born September 24, 1972) is an American singer- songwriter, and musician. He is best known as the frontman of the rock band Eagles of Death Metal. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock drummers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from South Carolina Category:Musicians from South Carolina Category:Writers from South Carolina Category:People from Greenville, South Carolina Category:Eagles of Death Metal Category:People from Palm Desert, California Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:Musicians from California
title: Jesse Hughes (musician)
